snippet: The 94-year-old former Nazi is charged with being an accessory to the murder of at least 170,000 people who died at the camp in Poland.
abstract: Trial of 94-year-old former Auschwitz guard Reinhold Hanning on accessory to murder charges opens in Germany; one survivor addresses ex-Nazi, who sat silently in court after previously denying he was involved in deaths at concentration camp where 170,000 people were slaughtered.
lead_paragraph: The 94-year-old former Nazi is charged with being an accessory to the murder of at least 170,000 people who died at the camp in Poland.

headline.main: Trial of Reinhold Hanning, Ex-Auschwitz Guard, Opens in Germany
headline.print_headline: Ex-Auschwitz Guard Silent as Trial Begins in Germany

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity
